00263     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00264     gsv_text::~gsv_text()
00265     {
00266         if(m_loaded_font) delete [] m_loaded_font;
00267         if(m_text_buf)    delete [] m_text_buf;
00268     }

00271     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00272     gsv_text::gsv_text() :
00273       m_x(0.0),
00274       m_y(0.0),
00275       m_start_x(0.0),
00276       m_width(10.0),
00277       m_height(0.0),
00278       m_space(0.0),
00279       m_line_space(0.0),
00280       m_text(m_chr),
00281       m_text_buf(0),
00282       m_buf_size(0),
00283       m_cur_chr(m_chr),
00284       m_font(gsv_default_font),
00285       m_loaded_font(0),
00286       m_status(initial)
00287     {
00288         m_chr[0] = m_chr[1] = 0;
00289     }

00297         if(m_font == 0) m_font = m_loaded_font;
00298     }

00327     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00328     void gsv_text::load_font(const char* file)
00329     {
00330         if(m_loaded_font) delete [] m_loaded_font;
00331         m_loaded_font = 0;
00332 
00333         FILE* fd = fopen(file, "rb");
00334         if(fd)
00335         {
00336             unsigned len;
00337 
00338             fseek(fd, 0l, SEEK_END);
00339             len = ftell(fd);
00340             fseek(fd, 0l, SEEK_SET);
00341             if(len > 0)
00342             {
00343                 m_loaded_font = new char [len];
00344                 fread(m_loaded_font, 1, len, fd);
00345                 m_font = m_loaded_font;
00346             }
00347             fclose(fd);
00348         }
00349     }
00350 
00351 
00352     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00353     void gsv_text::set_text(const char* text)
00354     {
00355         if(text == 0)
00356         {
00357             m_chr[0] = 0;
00358             m_text = m_chr;
00359             return;
00360         }
00361         unsigned new_size = strlen(text) + 1;
00362         if(new_size > m_buf_size)
00363         {
00364             if(m_text_buf) delete [] m_text_buf;
00365             m_text_buf = new char [m_buf_size = new_size];
00366         }
00367         memcpy(m_text_buf, text, new_size);
00368         m_text = m_text_buf;
00369     }
00370 
00371 
00372 
00373     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00374     void gsv_text::reset_iterator(unsigned)
00375     {
00376         m_status = initial;
00377         if(m_font == 0) return;
00378         
00379         m_indices = (int16*)m_font;
00380         double base_height = m_indices[2];
00381         m_indices += (*m_indices) >> 1;
00382         m_glyphs = (int8*)(m_indices + 257);
00383         m_h = m_height / base_height;
00384         m_w = (m_width == 0.0) ? m_h : m_width / base_height;
00385         m_cur_chr = m_text;
00386     }
00387 
00388 
00389     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00390     pathflag_e gsv_text::next_vertex(double* x, double* y)
00391     {
00392         unsigned idx;
00393         int8 yc, yf;
00394         int dx, dy;
00395         pathflag_e flag = pathflag_line_to;
00396 
00397         for(;;)
00398         {
00399             switch(m_status)
00400             {
00401             case initial:
00402                 if(m_font == 0) return pathflag_stop;
00403                 m_status = next_char;
00404 
00405             case next_char:
00406                 if(*m_cur_chr == 0) return pathflag_stop;
00407                 idx = (*m_cur_chr++) & 0xFF;
00408                 if(idx == '\n')
00409                 {
00410                     m_x = m_start_x;
00411                     m_y -= m_height + m_line_space;
00412                     break;
00413                 }
00414                 m_bglyph = m_glyphs + m_indices[idx];
00415                 m_eglyph = m_glyphs + m_indices[idx + 1];
00416                 m_status = start_glyph;
00417 
00418             case start_glyph:
00419                 *x = m_x;
00420                 *y = m_y;
00421                 m_status = glyph;
00422                 return pathflag_move_to;
00423 
00424             case glyph:
00425                 if(m_bglyph >= m_eglyph)
00426                 {
00427                     m_status = next_char;
00428                     m_x += m_space;
00429                     break;
00430                 }
00431                 dx = int16(*m_bglyph++);
00432                 yf = (yc = *m_bglyph++) & 0200;
00433                 yc <<= 1; 
00434                 yc >>= 1;
00435                 dy = int16(yc);
00436                 m_x += dx * m_w;
00437                 m_y += dy * m_h;
00438                 *x = m_x;
00439                 *y = m_y;
00440                 return yf ? pathflag_move_to : pathflag_line_to;
00441             }
00442 
00443         }
00444         return pathflag_stop;
00445     }
